title: Reflections in a Golden Eye
description: Five people in a peace time army camp. Five people each obsessed with the other, yet each alone in a private and impenetrable world. There's the Captain who dares not admit cowardice. There's the Major, whose ailing wife seeks consolation in the devoted attentions of a childlike Filipino. There's Private Williams, whose simple meandering existence requires strange peaks of fulfilment...
author: Carson McCullers
